title: Analysis of Feedback Deficiency's Impact on Learning Outcomes and PBL-Based Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and field experience related to professional occupations
context.additional_context: In a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields collaboratively solve scientific problems through project-based tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between feedback types (formal/informal) and learning outcomes through case analyses of at least three examples.
Learners can design and apply at least two peer assessment and self-reflection tools to compensate for feedback gaps in a PBL environment.
Learners can propose strategies to enhance learning engagement by over 20% using a smartphone-based feedback system in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
